sentences: Vana raidkirju uuriv ajaloo abiteadus on vanu.
See on otsene tuletis sõnast "vana" ja see kirjeldab epigraafikat kui teadust.
Vanu on seotud raidkirjadega ja nende analüüsiga.
context: The word 'vanu' is related to the Estonian word for ancient/old ('vana') and refers to epigraphy - the study of inscriptions. It appears to be a direct derivative or term used in academic contexts to describe this historical discipline focused on analyzing ancient carved texts.
